info.name: OVACS 3.5 - Updated with RBAC & Space Switching

request.description: Returns both following and followers with relationship details
NEW: Accounts I sent requests to (can switch to their space)
NEW: Accounts that sent requests to me (they can switch to my space)
Get cases where I'm assigned in a specific account
Accounts that are not connected with me (can send requests to)

**All Available Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (or 'all' for no pagination)
- `page_size`: Items per page
- `search`: Search in name/email/mobile
- `ordering`: Sort by name, created_at (add - for desc)
- `name`: Filter by name (contains)
- `email`: Filter by email (contains)
- `mobile`: Filter by mobile (contains)
- `country`: Filter by country name

**All Available Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (or 'all' for no pagination)
- `page_size`: Items per page  
- `search`: Search in title, description
- `ordering`: Sort by date, created_at (add - for desc)
- `title`: Filter by title (contains)
- `client`: Filter by client name (contains)
- `date_after`: Filter cases after date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `date_before`: Filter cases before date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `account_id`: **SPACE SWITCHING** - Get cases from specific account you're following
Role options: admin, diamond, gold, silver

request.description:
**All Available Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (or 'all' for no pagination)
- `page_size`: Items per page
- `search`: Search in title, description
- `ordering`: Sort by date, title, created_by__id (add - for desc)
- `title`: Filter by title (contains)
- `description`: Filter by description (contains)
- `date_after`: Filter sessions after date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `date_before`: Filter sessions before date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `case`: Filter by case ID
- `client`: Filter by client ID
- `is_active`: Filter by active status (true/false)
- `space_id`: **NEW - SPACE SWITCHING** - Get sessions from cases you're assigned to in specific account

request.description:
**All Available Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (or 'all' for no pagination)
- `page_size`: Items per page
- `search`: Search in file_name
- `ordering`: Sort by created_at, file_size, security_level (add - for desc)
- `file_name`: Filter by file name (contains)
- `case`: Filter by case ID
- `client`: Filter by client ID  
- `security_level`: Filter by security level (red/yellow/green)
- `group`: Filter by document group ID
- `session_id`: Filter by session ID
- `space_id`: **NEW - SPACE SWITCHING** - Get documents from cases you're assigned to in specific account

item.name: üîê RBAC & Space Switching
Permission Management

exec: // Store permissions for use in other requests

query.description: Target account ID for space switching (optional)
Specific case ID for case-level permissions (optional)
üîê SPACE SWITCHING: Access cases in another account you're connected to. Requires connection + case assignment.

request.description:
**Check User Permissions in Space**

This endpoint allows you to check what permissions the current user has in a specific space (account) and optionally for a specific case.

**Parameters:**
- `space_id` (optional): The account ID you want to check permissions for. If omitted, checks permissions in your own account.
- `case_id` (optional): Specific case ID to check case-level permissions.

**Response:**
```json
{
  "type": "success",
  "data": {
    "user_role": "gold",
    "permissions": {
      "case": ["read", "list"],
      "session": ["read", "update", "list"],
      "document": ["read", "list"]
    }
  }
}
```

**Use Cases:**
- Check what actions are available before showing UI elements
- Debug permission issues
- Validate access before making API calls
- Display user's role in different spaces

item.description:
**Permission Management Endpoints**

These endpoints help you understand and debug the Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system.

**Key Concepts:**

- **Roles**: owner, admin, diamond, gold, silver
    
- **Resources**: case, client, session, document, document_group, message
    
- **Actions**: create, read, update, delete, list, assign, unassign, manage_roles
    
- **Space Switching**: Access resources in other accounts you're connected to

**üîê Role-Based Access Control & Space Switching**

This section contains endpoints and examples for the new RBAC system that allows users to access resources across different accounts based on their assigned roles.

**Key Features:**
- **Space Switching**: Access resources in other accounts using `space_id` parameter
- **Role-Based Permissions**: Different access levels (owner, admin, diamond, gold, silver)
- **Case-Level Granularity**: Permissions tied to specific case assignments
- **Permission Checking**: Debug and validate access before making requests

**How to Use:**
1. First, check your permissions using the `check-permissions` endpoint
2. Use the `space_id` parameter in any resource endpoint to access other accounts
3. The system will automatically enforce role-based permissions
4. Use the updated examples in other sections that now include space switching
